installCommand: FLUTTER_ROOT="$PWD/.flutter"; export PATH="$FLUTTER_ROOT/flutter/bin:$PATH"; git config --global --add safe.directory "$FLUTTER_ROOT/flutter" >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; bash deploy/install_flutter.sh; npm install --prefix server
buildCommand: FLUTTER_ROOT="$PWD/.flutter"; export PATH="$FLUTTER_ROOT/flutter/bin:$PATH"; cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && flutter pub get && flutter build web --release
